alert.note: Alert for Weber (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 22 at 11:22AM MDT until May 30 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... South Fork of The Ogden River Near Huntsville affecting Weber County. .Snow melt and increased reservoir releases will cause the river flows to become high. Expect minor flooding downstream from the dam. For the Ogden River...including Huntsville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY, MAY 30... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork of The Ogden River Near Huntsville. * WHEN...Until Tuesday, May 30. * IMPACTS...At 4.6 feet, low lying areas near the banks of the South Fork of the Ogden River below Causey Reservoir through the town of Huntsville will receive minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Monday the stage was 4.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is forecast to remain above minor flood stage through Friday, May 26, then decreasing thereafter. There is some uncertainty in exactly when the river will fall below flood stage due to chances for showers through the week. - Flood stage is 4.6 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 1200 PM MDT.
